item.title: Report I-2024080124
item.description:
Report I-2024080124

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-03T09:21:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-11
  • City: FLUSHING
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: AMERICAN AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Customer's vape overheated causing the customer to almost burn his leg. Flight Attendants took vape and placed in a fire containment bag. Vape was an Elfbar BCS000 Vape, the second one to go into thermal runaway on American Airlines in the past year and a half.

item.title: Report I-2024090048
item.description:
Report I-2024090048

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-27T09:15:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-15
  • City: BLAUVELT
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS, LABELS, AND SHIPPING PAPERS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS OF THIS UNMARKED BOX WE DISCOVERED ONE SHOCK ABSORBER PART NUMBER 68234553AD. THE DEVICE IS MARKED CAUTION OIL AND GAS UNDER HIGH PRESSURE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. HAZ IS SHOWING ON A PRODUCT LABEL ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. SUPPLEMENTAL REPORT BEING SUBMITTED TO VOID THE 5800 FOR AN INCORRECTLY REPORTED UNDECLARED PACKAGE. MOPAR HAZMAT DANGEROUS GOODS CONFIRMED THIS PRODUCT SHIPS UNDER 49CFR 173.306(F)(4). THE PACKAGE WAS NOT REQUIRED TO HAVE HAZMAT CLASSIFICATION LABELS, MARKS, SHIPPING PAPER, OR UN SPECIFICATION PACKAGING TO SHIP THE PRODUCT ALSO MEETS IATA REGULATIONS SPECIAL PROVISION All4. NO VIOLATION. REPORT X-2024090276, INCIDENT 907656, TRACKING 44329. PART VII- RECOMMENDATIONS/ACTIONS TAKEN TO PREVENT RECURRENCE
